column4: let start over, i can't update my ubuntu it get stuck to "(Reading database ... 50%" and then "dpkg: unrecoverable fatal error, aborting: reading files list for package 'evince': Input/output error" what can i do ?
io error imples the filesystem or hardware issues with  the HD. i would start by fscking  the filesystems form a live cd.
what command do you sudgest ?
!fsck
i always fsck stuff from a live cd.. ;)  just makes things easier
wher do i see the result of this check?
it will print messages in the termianl
well i mean with the forcefsck
http://linuxpoison.blogspot.com/2009/04/how-to-checkrepair-fsck-filesystem.html
(since i have plymooth and stuff blabla)
i fsck from a LIVE CD when i need to.
ok i just did a forcefsck for now, do you now where i can check the result?
like the factoid says.. it will force a fsck  at the next reboot.. it will print some messages
or from a live cd terminal -   sudo fsck /dev/sdaX or whatever fs i want to check ;)
well ok, all i saw was the bootsplash thingy
!apt
!aptitude
fscking can be very quick if you are lucky. :) but if the issue keeps happening after you fsck. that would point to some hardware issues with the HD.
i don't seem to have any disk error
the dmesg command should be mentioning errors with the Hard disks also.
ok dmesg add somme error after the update try
